actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1058.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7152 to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1981 for the intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, for the Intelligence Community Staff, and for the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7152 (authorizes appropriations for intelligence and related activities, fiscal year 1981).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7152 to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1981 for the intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, for the Intelligence Community Staff, and for the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.
